position: Digital Marketing Manager at PLM Nordic AS

title: "Solution for Seamless Mobility Management"
summary: Our company's approach to managing mobile devices has been totally transformed by the outstanding mobility management solution AppTec Enterprise Mobile Manager. Data security, compliance, and efficient device management are major challenges that have been resolved, providing us with a seamless and secure environment that benefits our clients as well as our company.
strength: Since I've been using AppTec Enterprise Mobile Manager, a few things stand out as particularly noteworthy. To begin with, their comprehensive approach to mobility management is superb. It covers every part of overseeing mobile devices in a business, such as security, application deployment, and remote assistance. Because of the intuitive interface that makes it easy to investigate and monitor every device in our fleet of mobile devices, our IT staff is able to handle them with efficiency.
weakness: This platform offers no grounds for dissatisfaction. It's amazing that it satisfies all of our business needs flawlessly given

title: The most cost-effective CRM system available, providing all necessary features in one intuitive platform.
summary: Creatio has given us the platform we've always dreamed of, consolidating all relevant features in one place. Whenever something seems to be missing, we can find it in the system so easily, making it incredibly convenient for our needs. The ability to say goodbye to all our Excel sheets and legacy systems has been a significant benefit, as everything we need is now centralized. Additionally, integrating with our accounting system, while requiring some effort, works seamlessly and enhances our workflow.
strength: We love the fact that all necessary tools and features are consolidated in one place, eliminating the need for multiple systems and spreadsheets. This centralization has streamlined our operations and significantly improved our efficiency. The platform's ease of integration with other systems, like accounting software, further enhances its utility.
weakness: While the comprehensive nature of Studio Creatio CRM is a major advantage, it also means the system is more complicated than simpler alternatives. Some features are more challenging to understand and use, especially for new users. Improving the intuitiveness of these features and providing more user-friendly guides and support would help mitigate this complexity.

title: Very dynamic platform that keeps businesses in sync with constantly evolving technologies, enabling rapid customization and automation.
summary: Creatio has been an excellent complement to our business needs. Using the platform, we were able to create custom sales processes and product workflows tailored to our specific requirements. Configuring customer onboarding was straightforward, and process automation has significantly reduced our manual workload. The unified work environment with shared data has streamlined our customer onboarding processes. Additionally, Creatio's commitment to continuous product improvement and customer service is evident. The low-code technology allows us to quickly develop and deploy new processes, and custom dashboards help us track efficiency, identify bottlenecks, and make necessary improvements independently.
strength: We appreciate Creatio's dedication to keeping their product aligned with the latest technological advancements and their exceptional customer service. The platform's low-code capabilities provide speed and agility, making it easy to develop and deploy new processes. The custom dashboards are particularly valuable, allowing us to monitor and enhance our process efficiency with ease.
weakness: There aren’t any dislikes about Studio Creatio.
